description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Snake is classic game in which a player controls a snake and tries to eat its food. Each time you eat your snake gets longer. Avoid the snake and walls while trying to obtain food.
description.short: Snake is classic game in which a player controls a snake and tries to eat its food. Each time you eat your snake gets longer. Avoid the snake and walls while trying to obtain food.
